LANGUAGE.LABEL: Click Here To View Commission File
CALCULATE COMMISSIONS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate commissions for all outstanding orders in the date range specified below.
CALCULATE BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to calculate pool bonuses for all orders in the date range specified below.
AGAP REPORT: Click the "Process" button below to create a commission file for all pending commissions in the date range specified below.
RECORD PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all pending commissions in the date range specified below.

CREATE PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all complete and unpaid commissions up to the "To Date" specified below. Confirm that all completed commissions have been marked accordingly.
PAY PENDING PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to pay all pending payouts up to the "To Date" specified below.
CALCULATE ADVANCEMENT: Click the "Process" button below to calculate advancements.
